value.title: China unleashes might of AI on next-generation supercomputer to meet demand for more power

value.title: Jensen Huang gets chip industry’s highest honor 28 years after founding Nvidia
value.excerpt: About 38 years after he started Nvidia, CEO Jensen Huang received the chip industry's highest honor, the Robert N. Noyce Award.

value.title: MediaTek announces new Filogic 130 series chips: will bring Wi-Fi 6 & Bluetooth 5.2 to IoT devices
value.excerpt: MediaTek has announced new Filogic 130 and Filogic 130A single-chip solutions to bring Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.2 connectivity to IoT devices.

value.title: MediaTek leaps into flagship phones with cutting-edge 4nm Dimensity 9000 chip
value.excerpt: The Dimensity 9000 is MediaTek's first true flagship phone processor, and the world's first built using a 4nm process. The company talked to us about it.

value.title: Nvidia Crypto Mining Chip Sales Drop 60%, Overall Revenue Growth Strong
value.excerpt: Nvidia has released its financial results for the third quarter of the 2022 fiscal year. While overall revenue has grown considerably, the sales of its 'Cryptocurrency Mining Processors' have experienced a sharp decline.

value.title: sureCore designs multi-port memory for Semidynamics AI chip

value.title: Nvidia CEO: Supply chain mess 'was a wake-up call for everybody'
value.excerpt: Nvidia said it has enough supply of its own chips to meet demand, but companies should "be more mindful about not taking the supply chain for granted."

value.title: Rethinking AI: Dire Warnings And Imperfect Results
value.excerpt: AI has been in the news a lot lately, and not all for good reasons. What are the issues? I am write about some of them here.

value.title: Helm.ai raises $26M for ‘unsupervised’ autonomous driving software
value.excerpt: Helm.ai, a startup developing software for autonomous vehicles trained using unsupervised learning techniques, has raised $26 million.

value.title: SambaNova is enabling disruption in the enterprise with AI language models, computer vision, recommendations, and graphs
value.excerpt: SambaNova just added another offering under its umbrella of AI-as-a-service portfolio for enterprises: GPT language models. As the company continues to execute on its vision, we caught up with CEO Rodrigo Liang to look both at the big picture and under the hood.

value.title: Astera Labs announces memory acceleration to clear datacenter AI/ML bottlenecks
value.excerpt: Astera Labs announced a memory accelerator platform based on the Compute Express Link (CXL) standard for datacenter devices.

value.title: AI Start-Up Gives Sustainable Wastewater Management A High-Tech Refresh
value.excerpt: In Australia, start-up Streamwise D.I. has developed an AI-powered intelligence platform providing industrial-grade digitisation for wastewater treatment.

value.title: AI/ML Workloads Need Extra Security
value.excerpt: The need for security is pervading all electronic systems. But given the growth in data-center machine-learning computing, which deals with extremely valuable data, some companies are paying particular attention to handling that data securely.

value.title: Samsung Exynos 2200’s AMD GPU exhibits 34% peak performance improvement over predecessor

value.title: New Spiking Neuromorphic Chip Could Usher in an Era of Highly Efficient AI

value.title: NVIDIA's new AI brain for robots is six times more powerful than its predecessor

value.title: Nvidia debuts ReOpt to optimize supply chain routing with AI
